#include <iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		long long int n;
		cin>>n;
		int m=(int)sqrt(n);
		int msquare=m*m;
		if(msquare==n)
			cout<<2*m-1<<"\n";
		else{
			int count=2*m-1;
			int k=(m+1)*(m+1);
			int x=(k-msquare-1)/2;
			if(n<=msquare+x)
				count++;
			else
				count=count+2;
			cout<<count<<"\n";
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
